Smart Umbrella: A high-tech umbrella that can detect rain and wind conditions, adjust its shape, and even change colors to match your mood or outfit. It can also act as a portable power bank to charge your devices on the go. Confidence Score: 0.8

Personalized Umbrella: An umbrella that can be customized with your name, initials, or a personal message. It can also have a built-in LED light to provide extra visibility during nighttime walks or runs. Confidence Score: 0.9

Umbrella with Built-in Speaker: An umbrella with a built-in speaker that can play your favorite music or podcasts during your commute or outdoor activities. It can also have a built-in microphone for hands-free calls. Confidence Score: 0.8

GPS-Enabled Umbrella: An umbrella with a built-in GPS tracker that can help you locate it if it gets lost. It can also have a panic button that can send an alert to your emergency contacts in case of an emergency. Confidence Score: 0.9

Foldable Umbrella: A compact and lightweight umbrella that can fold into a small size, making it easy to carry in a bag or purse. It can also have a built-in bottle opener or a small flashlight for added functionality. Confidence Score: 0.8
